title: Warlock
content: the Blade Extra Attack is not supposed to stack with other Extra Attacks per the description, but seems to currently. Hunger of Hadar is an amazing spell that can be used both for area denial, but also deal damage and crowd control at the same time. War Caster or Resilient (CON) are both good choices of Feats to help you maintain Concentration of spells like Hunger of Hadar, Darkness or Cloud of Daggers.
